page.title: 13SHOPS
page.content: THERE ARE SEVEN SHOPS IN OUR VILLAGE OF STURMINSTER MARSHALL.ONE IS CALLED CASHES AFTER THE PEOPLE WHO RUN IT.IT SELLS COTTON,LACE AND SPECIAL EYES FOR PEOPLE WHO MAKE TOYS AND NEED EYES TO MAKE UP FACES.IT SELLS EVERYTHING TO DO WITH MATERIAL.THERE IS A POST OFFICE AS WELL.THERE ARE TWO GROCERY SHOPS THAT ARE QUITE SMALL BUT SELL LOTS OF THINGS.THEY ARE CALLED ARROW AND THE OLD FORGE.THE OLD FORGE USED TO BE CLOSED BECAUSE THE PEOPLE WHO RAN IT MOVED AWAY.ANOTHER FAMILY CAME TO LIVE THERE AND THEY OPENED THE SHOP AGAIN.THERE IS ANOTHER SHOP CALLED ZENA,IT IS A HAIR DRESSER.A SHOP CALLED MIDDLEDITCHES SELLS BOOKS, CLOTHES, SHOES AND FURNITURE.THERE IS A PAPER SHOP AND AT SHAPWICK THERE IS A POST OFFICE AND FOOD SHOP COMBINED.
